paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR gene and its variants, particularly focusing on the Val30Met mutation, including penetrance data and clinical presentations.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In Portugal, the median age at onset is around 30 years, and 80% of mutation carriers are reported to exhibit the disease by age 50.
In Sweden, this number is only 11%.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant leads to misfolding of the TTR protein, resulting in amyloid deposition.

variants.segregation_data: The Val30Met variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.population_frequency: Higher prevalence in endemic regions such as Portugal and Sweden.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance varies significantly between different populations.
key_quotes: 80% of mutation carriers are reported to exhibit the disease by age 50, whereas this number is only 11% in Sweden.

tables_processed.table_caption: Characteristics of Val30Met early- and late-onset ATTR amyloidosis at the time of diagnosis and clinical course

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear data on the TTR variant.
